alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:01AM MST until December 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches above 6000 feet through Tuesday morning and upwards of 4 to 8 inches in the lower mountain-valley locations. Periods of strong gusty winds with blowing snow. * WHERE...Sawtooth region, including Stanley, Ketchum, and Sun Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times. In addition to heavy snow, areas of blowing snow will also be possible, especially over mountain passes where whiteout conditions may develop. Commutes will likely be impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
